title: Pentagon to provide recommendation on transgender troops this week
text:
Pentagon to provide recommendation on transgender troops this week 7:20pm EST - 01:19 
U.S. Defense Secretary Jim Mattis will provide his recommendation to President Donald Trump on transgender individuals and military service sometime this week, the Pentagon said on Thursday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
